artist: Artist: Henri Matisse; Author: Pierre Reverdy; Publisher: Éditions du Chêne, Paris; Lithographer: Mourlot Freres, Paris; Printer: Fequet et Baudier, Paris, France , (text)
image_copyright: © Succession H. Matisse %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
text:
This illustrated book is unique because Matisse’s friend the poet Pierre Reverdy created a text to accompany Matisse’s images. Somewhat earlier Matisse had created a series of lithographs representing one of his female models, and their existence prompted a publishers to suggest printing them as a collector’s edition. 
 
For the general design, Matisse followed his usual practice of creating appropriate ornaments and of combining these with images and text in the order he saw fit.
title: Faces
